channel.title: Custom Coding Help
channel.description:
Okay, i got some help from someone else, and got these codes...
[size=10pt]::YELL modification[/size]
What this mod was supposed to do is tag Staff members in yell
[code] else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) {
command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "ifag"); command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "ifag"); command.substring(5).trim();
if(muted == 1) sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!"); else String prefix = (playerRights == 3) ? "[Owner] " : (playerRights == 2) ? "[Admin] " : (playerRights == 1) ? "[Mod] " : "[User]"; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = prefix + playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); } [/code]
My Compiler tells me this...
[code] client.java:11269: not a statement String prefix = (playerRights == 3) ? "[Owner] " : (playerRights == 2) ? "[Admin] " : (playerRights == 1) ? "[Mod] " : "[User]"; ^ client.java:11269: ';' expected String prefix = (playerRights == 3) ? "[Owner] " : (playerRights == 2) ? "[Admin] " : (playerRights == 1) ? "[Mod] " : "[User]"; ^ 2 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .
[/code]
Also... I wanted to know if I could make [Admin] and [Owner] Replaced with the crowns, and [Mod] replaced with its crown.
[size=10pt]Deathless Admin Mod[/size]
I never got the straight code, but i'll say it to the best of my knowledge [code] if (playerRights >= 2); myHP = 99; [/code] It was something like that so Administrators and Owners are invincible.
[size=10pt]Crown Mod[/size]
I awanted to know how to modify the crowns for staff.
[size=10pt]Cannot Heal?[/size]
I don't know what i messed up, but for some reason, i cannot heal
Server Details: 317 HiyaScape v1 Base Current Mods: None
Big thanx to anybody who can help![br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 13, 2009, 09:40:46 am[/size][hr]bump?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2009, 05:54:02 pm[/size][hr]cmon anybody!?

item.title: Custom Coding Help
item.dc:creator: @Alex4108 Alex4108
item.description:
@Alex4108 wrote:

Okay, i got some help from someone else, and got these codes…

[size=10pt]::YELL modification[/size]

What this mod was supposed to do is tag Staff members in yell

	else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5)
	{

command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "ifag");
command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "ifag");
command.substring(5).trim();

                if(muted == 1)
                sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
                else
                String prefix = (playerRights == 3) ? "[Owner] " : (playerRights == 2) ? "[Admin] " : (playerRights == 1) ? "[Mod] " : "[User]";
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = prefix + playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5);
	}

My Compiler tells me this…

client.java:11269: not a statement
                String prefix = (playerRights == 3) ? "[Owner] " : (playerRights
 == 2) ? "[Admin] " : (playerRights == 1) ? "[Mod] " : "[User]";
                ^
client.java:11269: ';' expected
                String prefix = (playerRights == 3) ? "[Owner] " : (playerRights
 == 2) ? "[Admin] " : (playerRights == 1) ? "[Mod] " : "[User]";
                      ^
2 errors
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

Also… I wanted to know if I could make [Admin] and [Owner] Replaced with the crowns, and [Mod] replaced with its crown.

[size=10pt]Deathless Admin Mod[/size]

I never got the straight code, but i’ll say it to the best of my knowledge

if (playerRights >= 2);
myHP = 99;

It was something like that so Administrators and Owners are invincible.

[size=10pt]Crown Mod[/size]

I awanted to know how to modify the crowns for staff.

[size=10pt]Cannot Heal?[/size]

I don’t know what i messed up, but for some reason, i cannot heal

Server Details:
317
HiyaScape v1 Base
Current Mods: None

Big thanx to anybody who can help![br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 13, 2009, 09:40:46 am[/size][hr]bump?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2009, 05:54:02 pm[/size][hr]cmon anybody!?
